long_description: Control the sun with the lightweight, packable and convertible Easton Sundial sun shelter. High-quality construction and versatile configurations make it the perfect partner for shade wherever you go. Whether you're setting up basecamp, spending the day on the water, belaying your favorite crag or having a picnic, the Sundial shelter puts shade where you need it. Convert the Sundial shelter to a sitting or standing position; it has a stable and flexible, breeze-resistant design. Tilt it up to create a taller shade area for standing under or protecting a group site from the low-angle sun; perfect for standing to cook or belaying at a sun-exposed wall. Low-profile sitting position provides shelter from sun, wind or rain; perfect for getting out of the noonday sun or a day at the beach. Freestanding design is quick and easy to set up and move with the sun or wind. Color coded poles and clips ensure an easy setup. Durable construction: waterproof materials and fabric, and reinforced seams and double-stitched anchor points. Easton Sundial shelter comes with quality 7075 T9 aluminum poles (made in the USA) and aluminum stakes; Large size includes four poles; small size includes two poles.
